message: Severe flooding in our barangay! Need immediate assistance.
The latest typhoon update shows it will make landfall tomorrow morning.
I fear for those living near the shoreline with this storm surge warning.
Minor tremors felt, but no damage reported. Everyone remain vigilant.
Landslide warning issued for mountainous regions following continuous rain.
This can't be happening again - another volcanic alert level increase?
Our community will come together to help those affected by flooding. #BayanihanSpirit
Fire incident reported downtown, multiple fire trucks responding.
Ash fall advisory in effect. Please wear masks if going outside.
Evacuation centers now open for residents in flood-prone areas.
